title: Mosaic: DeFi Functionality for NFTs
description: It is exceedingly difficult to price, monetize and leverage expensive NFTs. There is no service offering adequate options for NFT collectors

f6_assessments.q0: There is no detailed plan on what is being proposed here. Please provide one and explain how it meets the challenge and benefits the community.
f6_assessments.q1: As there is no plan, it is highly unlikely it will be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: Please provide a plan with timelines, milestones and goals against which progress and success can be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal aims to fractionalize, collateralize, trade, pool, govern, and flex their NFTs. The terms are vague and have not been defined clearly in the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer claims to be a group in all relevant fields, however, no details or identity has been provided to evaluate the capability.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is one of five proposals of the proposer that does not fulfill any formal requirements while asking for large sums of funds. Please do not vote for this.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan and rationale for the budget are presented, no proof of qualification is given.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is clearly not sufficient for any auditing.

f6_assessments.q0: NFT with DeFi is one of hot ideas in the blockchain these days. The biggest challenge that comes here is price prediction of NFT which is very important element to collateralise the NFT. I would suggest to come up with a promising solution for NFT price prediction like special type of auction where highest bid can be maximum amount of loan .
f6_assessments.q1: The prosocial could be better if there is more details about team experience or link of previous work done in these kind of idea.
f6_assessments.q2: There could be more details on detailed plan like how they are going to the different challenge like price prediction , on which basis NFT can be collateralised. And little bit more details about fund management and road map to the product.

solution: Focused on product and UX, Mosaic offers NFT collectors the chance to fractionalize, collateralize, trade, pool, govern, and flex their NFTs
experience: We are a collection of NFT creators, developers and collectors partnering with top blockchain developers and traditional financial experts.
